summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4654 for the improvement of 51st Avenue Southwest, from West College Street to West Wait Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and side sewers, together with the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 54083, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
